website_summaries.verdict: An affordable but sturdy option that will benefit from a coat of varnish.
pros: Assembles in under half an hour, no tools needed
Adjustable feet help keep it level, making it very stable
cons: Plastic brackets that hold shelves in place are cheap

customer_reviews.title: Small kitchen cart HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: The problem here is that Amazon still allows multiple products under one ASIN and therefore the star ratings here are averaged over multiple products. I am reviewing the small kitchen cart which was horrible. The cutting board was warped, the metal legs weren’t straight, and one of the wheels didn’t even touch the floor. A disaster honestly - so jankety! I had already had the cart for too long to return it by the time I put it together. Won’t buy again. And this whole averaging star ratings for different products is BS. Amazon needs to stop this.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Craddick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble Attractive Baker Racks
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for the long kitchen in my city apartment, which lacked both storage and counter space. Got two and those who can see the photos included, I tricked them out a bit with some lighting and what is turning into a successful little kitchen herb garden along the top there. The racks are not too high, which I like as I'm not too tall! They are sturdy and are holding up to daily use beautifully, were super easy to put together - didn't even require tools - and can be easily be taken apart and moved. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ThisMissMolly

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've bought for the kitchen in a long time. I have a small kitchen and I need to make good use of every inch of countertop space. This shelf has proved invaluable for plants, placing veggies that need to ripen and just looks great. Would have gladly paid more for this shelf unit, but couldn't be happier to have found it at the price I paid on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike135

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kitchen cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great! It is compact but fits many items, freeing my counters and cabinets. It is very sturdy/strong and moves smoothly in its caster wheels. It's so easy to put together too! It took me about 10 minutes... Excellent product! (See uploaded photo)
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 hours of trying to put it together I gave up. The parts did not fit together properly and then got all wedged together. I tried to take it all apart and start over and the pieces would not come apart. I hired a man to see if he could do in. After over an hour, he came back with it all in pieces and said there is no way it could go together correctly and gave it back to me. I am now out the money I paid for it and have a pile of crome and small pieces in a bag ready for the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne P.

customer_reviews.title: Only for lower faucets with 2 knobs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shelf. I wanted to use it fir the intended purpose.... behind a double sink, but I have a standard height pivoting single handle faucet that gets raised to be turned on, & even at the shelf’s highest level it was not tall enough to allow for the handle to be raised. I’m keeping it to use for something else, but very disappointed that it did not work out over my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Massaging Yoga RN

customer_reviews.title: MINUS 5 STARS....BUY A LOTTERY TICKET INSTEAD!
customer_reviews.text: This is the single over the sink shelf, not the full shelf. Horrible, unusable, crap. Pieces to assemble break, do not stay in place. Impossible assembly for even the most able. Way too short, no additional legs available. Throw a $20 throw it out the car window instead! 2 days of effort, end result? Giant wood chew bone for my dog or bonfire weeny roast! I never had to give such a bad review, but this was earned. Repeat. SAVE YOUR $ AND SANITY!
customer_reviews.author: Jbeaux

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Just what I needed and what I was expecting. Perfect size, wheels move a little bit when locked is so far my only complaint. The slide out shelf is so handy. I have a regular kitchen stand that I got from walmart or some place. No wheels but does the job and was really cheap. I'm thinking of buying this one again to replace that one. Its a little pricey. But if you have a small kitchen like me, you need to use every bit of space you an.
customer_reviews.author: SICARIO312

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It holds so much. Shelves adjust. Pretty simple to set up. Feels sturdy. Perfect for me, I have no counter space so I got this for my appliances and as a coffee station. Looks great. Only issue is the cutting board is a little bit shaky/doesn’t sit in perfectly. Maybe this will change over time. It’s hardly noticeable though. I already knew it was going to be shorter than counter level. So this wouldn’t work well for a prep table for taller people. Perfect for a coffee station or extra storage- even holds my HUGE microwave! This would be perfect for prep for shorter people of even introducing children to cooking!
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap. Feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this item. The piece of wood that sits on the top does not fit smoothly and wobbles back-and-forth when you set something on it. The chrome zigzag design doesn’t go to the end and it looks like they forgot to finish it. It looks cheap. I’m very unhappy, and very disappointed. You need to be more clear on the measurements, also. When you say the shelf is a certain number of inches high, you’re talking about the top of the shelf not the bottom of the shelf Where the handle on the water Spicket goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a good price. Just dont be an idiot like me, and read the directions before putting it together....or at least pay attention to what you are doing. It is VERY simple to put together, no tools required. There are black stoppers that you put on the legs to hold the shelves up, and I put half of them on upside down (that's the idiot part). The wheels have stoppers on them so you can keep it in place, which is a nice feature, and it holds my microwave nicely. I have a microwave that is on the smaller size, but it's not tiny.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: It's a shelf and I put stuff on it.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked (and needed) the unit, but it was too short for the faucet I had as the single style handle hit the underside of the shelf only allowing the valves to open about half way resulting in very low water flow. As I said, I really needed the shelf, counter space in the place I'm currently staying is in short supply. Anyway, to drag out an already boring story, I headed to Home Depot, Frankensteined some much longer adjustable feet together out of parts I found in the hardware section and now it fits perfect. I'd have given it 5 stars if it had longer adjustable feet in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: fdmelcher

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The side of the wooden top that has the groove routed around it was a mess. The routing was uneven and rough. I didn't notice this until after I assembled it, and didn't want to have to take it all apart to return it. I realize I could flip it over to the smooth side, but I shouldn't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable Cart-Pretty Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: For what this product does, it works okay. The instructions for assembly aren't great and I had to take it apart once to re-assemble. There are tabs that fit over the support poles and then the shelves rest on those plastic tabs. If you don't seat the shelves just right over the tabs, everything is pretty shaky. Even seated right, this cart wobbles a little. I use it for my microwave and a couple pots and pans. It stays in the corner and I don't move it a lot. For me it works fine, but if you want something that you move around, it might not be the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Anne

customer_reviews.title: Sink shelf, good but short
customer_reviews.text: Like the look. Definitely adds function in a small kitchen. Sturdy. Like the wood and metal design ONLY drawback, these legs are simply not tall enough to allow even my relatively short faucet to operate. I extended the legs fully, the also set something g u der ea bc h of them for extra height and now is fine, but really on it's own too short for a sink. Length and width were fine
customer_reviews.author: Çlmc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was sad when I had to give away my first baker's rack because I was moving and have always felt a little bit of regret doing so. A few years later, I decided to get another one and am so happy! It's just as nice as the first and was easy to put together. I plan on putting a microwave on the second shelf and using the top shelf to grow veggies and herbs. I definitely recommend getting this, especially for small spaces, like mine. I usually add photos to my reviews but can't seem to find the option to do that, for this one. I will add photos if the option becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Love, LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to buy a baker's rack for several months now... THIS was the right one to get! No tools were needed for assembly- I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to put together, and even though two people would make it really easy, I assembled it myself. The top rack now serves to hold plants (HEAVY ones), and the lower racks hold my smaller appliances. The cutting board is nice quality. The only thing I added was more hooks... the rack only came with a handful. Overall I'm VERY happy with my purchase! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Great find with an unexpected twist.
customer_reviews.text: but, without the wood, it works MUCH better over the range for storage. I'll have to find something less deep and shorter for over the sink. I think it looks sharp in its new location. VERY useful. Score!! Thanks Whitmor! Update: It looks so good, I bought a second one for over my sink. Sweet! Not using the wood there either. I sure wish these were stackable.
customer_reviews.author: QueenOPearls

customer_reviews.title: great baker's rack
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much counter space in my kitchen. This rack gave me extra space so that my counters stay clutter-free. I also bought shelf liners to make it easier to store my mixer and other small appliances on the shelves. I use the hanging hooks for small fry pans too. The cutting board is very heavy and good quality. The rack is easy to assemble, but just know that the box is very heavy and it was a little difficult for me to cut the box open. I spent way more time trying to get the parts out of the box than I did actually assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shelf for anything you can put on an open shelf.
customer_reviews.text: This was simple to put together. It is very solid and attractive and is the exact height of my window sill. I use it as a plant stand on my kitchen counter but it can be used for anything a shelf can be used for. I searched many months for something like this to no avail then one day it just popped up. I love how it looks and that the wooden top can be removed and cleaned easily. It helps my counter look clean and organized. I have had many compliments on how nice it looks. I would highly recommend it for your countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it to. Fit and finish seem to be very good, and it took less than fifteen minutes to assemble. For smaller apartments this is an absolute must. It's not too big but it seriously helps store and organize everything in your kitchen (or wherever you decide to put it). I have a blender, microwave, ninja cooker, convection oven, induction burner, cutting boards, and an entire pot/pan set on this thing and there's still plenty of room on the counter and the top shelf. I'd definitely recommend this to someone needing some extra kitchen space or storage. For me this was a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cart for my Cricut machine and supplies.
customer_reviews.text: This cart is AMAZING. My Cricut machine fits perfectly on top with my materials and heat press underneath. It arrived on time, on perfect condition and was easy to put together. (Less than 30 minutes). The cart is sturdy and easily moves from one place to another. The wheels do have locks on them which also helps to keep the cart stable. This cart would be good for many different things such as a microwave cart. Or a cart to serve at parties. Also great for gardening although I keep it inside so I’ve had no issues with rusting. This cart is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Merlina

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Tip!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the sink shelf. I have a small apartment and need every storage and organization advantage I can muster. I did not use the wood insert and use this as a pot lid rack as well as a storage area. It is well built with adjustable foot pegs. As to assembly, there are plastic tabs that fit on the legs to secure the brace and shelf. It is barely noticeable but one end of the plastic tab is tapered for insertion of the shelf or brace, make sure the tapered end is up so that the corresponding part will fit over it. If you have the plastic tab inverted the part will not seat.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE CART!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is now holding my Excalbur dehydrator on the top, my toaster oven in the middle, and my wastebasket on the bottom for carrot peeling. I appreciate the reviewer who switched the pull out middle shelf and put it on the bottom for a wastebasket. I'm into juicing, so this makes it much easier to use the bottom shelf to pull out and "peel into" the wastebasket on it while I sit on my rolling kitchen chair. It's perfect! Also, very easy to put together which I appreciated :)
customer_reviews.author: FREQUENT BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Lots of extra space!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a city apartment, with a very small kitchen. The deluxe baker's rack is easy to assemble and allows for a lot of much needed space. It includes 4 S hooks to hang pots and pans on. I picked up a few more S hooks at the hardware store and have my plastic spoons and accessories attached now. The metal shelves on the rack are a great place to store dry goods, a toaster and anything I don't have room for in the kitchen. The cutting board is decent and gives me a little extra room to prepare food on.
customer_reviews.author: OceanWave

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble lots of storage space, lots of versatile uses
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few baker’s shelves like these; their clean look and storage space make it easy to store things in plain sight in a small space. I don’t really intend to use the cutting board, but it is handy because appliances with feet have something to sit on. I added some 1/4” casters with locks on so I could move this item into the kitchen for more work space if needed or plug in appliances elsewhere. The cross brace in the back seems to be a little bent, but it otherwise fit during assembly. Could use more hooks than the 4 that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: mikeg77

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good stand. It is a nice size and took no more than fifteen minutes to put together
customer_reviews.author: Vibrant Thang

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice and Saves Space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store my (rather large) mug collection in my small apartment kitchen. In addition to freeing up my cupboard space, it adds a nice, homey decoration to my kitchen. I've had it for quite some time now, and it shows no signs of degradation--no rust or spoiling of the wood--in spite of being so close to the wet sink environment.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy to date
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy to date, this has easily accomplished the needs I had - mainly a new counter space for a toaster oven and crock-pot, plus shelves for Tupperware containers filled with cereal, as well as storage for boxes of bottles (beer). It was shorter than I mentally envisioned, only coming up to my shoulder roughly, but large enough for my needs. My only quibble is that the top "shelf" is wire, which I didn't think was clear from the description. I can use it, I have things that fit there with little issue, but I think I may get a board to place on the top for a more stable footing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I recently removed the trash compactor from my kitchen and needed something to fill the space- this cart fit the bill perfectly! It was super easy to assemble and feels sturdy. I opted to switch the shelves and put the one that pulls out on the bottom (the instructions list it as the upper shelf); this will make it easier to get to my heavy mixer. I have minimal drawer space in my kitchen so this also gave me a place for potholders and oven mitts. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PamelaJR

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: Nice shelf. However, the instructions failed to mention that the black casings have top inscribed on the item and being black you can barely see the word top. It should mention this in the written instructions since there is a slight difference that is not readily recognizable . I put one leg together with the casing wrong way up and it fit so snuggly I could not get it apart to turn it over consequently one leg is longer than the other three. Even a hammer could not dislodge it. So I took a hammer to all of them.
customer_reviews.author: GPH

customer_reviews.title: Using as a "medicine cabinet" since my rental doesn't have one
customer_reviews.text: My rental house doesn't have a medicine cabinet for the master bathroom (weird), but this shelf seems to help give me more room and places to put things. I ended up taking off the wooden top, I have some clear plastic boxes and jars of things under it, and it made it too dark. It still works well! I just use clear plastic trays from Target and light can get through.
customer_reviews.author: ScretSquirrl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product. Continued use over a year.
customer_reviews.text: This product has earned a 5 bags of popcorn review. Wow. I keep a large ninja foodi on top. This fits in a perfect snug corner. I use the hooks on the ends to hang pots and pans to dry. The Build is easy to assemble. I like how the top wooden board has rubber feet for easy removal. When I am preparing food and need more counter I use this board. After preparing my meal and I am cleaning, I can take it up and wipe clippings in the trash. I have moved this from one apartment to the next. It is very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and needed!
customer_reviews.text: I moved in the last few weeks into a house with absolutely NO counter space and very little cabinet space - me with just about every kitchen appliance and a full set of dishes! So with this baker's rack I bought it for the cutting space on the wooden cutting board. What I love is that out of the box this was a quick put-together unit and feels very sturdy. The clips fit together perfectly, the shelves slid down onto the clips and once I had the second shelf on, I could feel how sturdy it was going to be when finished! I would highly recommend it if you are looking for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Martin

customer_reviews.title: Does its job with a clean look
customer_reviews.text: Our kitchen suffers from the lack of cabinet space, so a kitchen rack was our best solution. It is sturdy enough for storing all of my pots and pans, and the hooks are used for smaller fry pans and cooking utencils. It comes with extra stoppers for adjusting the racks. I purchased extra hooks so that the entire back row can hold all of my most-used items. I keep dry ingredients such as pasta and grains on the top rack in clear containers/jars. I have enough counter space to not have to use the cutting board, so that is where I keep my instant pot and rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Wu

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I have way too many kitchen appliances, and this allowed me to get some counter space back. I like the wooden board, although I won’t ever use it as a cutting board. It’s a strange height (feels like it should be about a foot higher) but I’m able to put a tall blender on the top so that makes it not seem so bad. I am able to store 2 oval crockpots, an air fryer XL, a bread maker, a large rice maker, 2 instant pots (6 and 8 qt) plus trivets and steamer baskets on this thing and it doesn’t seem over loaded!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Extra Storage Space for a Small Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen cart. I live in an apartment and have limited counter space, then I bought an InstaPot and had no place to put it. What was great about this cart is that you can adjust the shelves to suit your needs. So I measured the height of the InstaPot and adjusted the shelves so it could get off my counter and fit on the bottom shelf of this cart. It was very easy to put together and another great thing is that the top is a real butcher block. Others I looked at were just a laminate. It also has wheels with two locking wheels so I can move it when I need to open my cupboard doors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Nehez

customer_reviews.title: Minor top shelf issue
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been really happy with this, just one minor issue. I wish the top shelf either had a solid shelf insert or the metal slats were closer together. We bought this to use in our tiny kitchen to make up for lack of storage space. We are keeping our spices on the top shelf, but they fall over constantly because the slats are too far apart for a standard spice jar. Otherwise it’s sturdy, and seems well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for Organizing around the Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, large over the sink shelf. I am using it in a bathroom with no linen storage, so I am using it for my extra washcloths and hand towels as well as a couple of decorative candles and a box of tissues.My bottles of cotton balls, q-tips, and such fit below the shelf. The hand soap dispenser and cup fit where they always did around either side of the faucet. The sink area looks attractive and organized, and everything is easy to use. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rockhound

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Get the other one from Amazon basic, this one is too SMALL!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for more counter space
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this product for my boyfriend’s apartment because the counter space was really small. I thought I would use this product to add more counter space since it has a built in cutting board but I ended up using that space to place my toaster oven and rice cooker. Unfortunately I’m unable to use the top-most shelf and the hooks to store my pans because of the heat from the appliances. If you’re going to use this for storage on non-appliances, its really great! It has great storage space and it’s large enough to use as a cutting space as well. The wood is really sturdy. One con is that the rack can be a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: One pole was bent and not very sturdy without anchor in wall
customer_reviews.text: We put the bakers rack together and one of the pole holes were bent. We were able to get it together by tapping the sides, but it was not easy. It still was assembled but I definitely would not recommend due to lack of inspection at the factory. Someone wasn't paying attention. It is also not very sturdy without the wall zip-tie-anchor, which was included for a very obvious reason. The piece with hooks for pots did not go high enough to fit my small saucepan. Perhaps my pan handles are longer than standard. It's already put together, we're not returning it after spending time getting the thing together. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product but I don't understand why you get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product but I don't understand why you get the last star then and damaged items when you order through Amazon? See pictures below!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Amereihn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product for the price, I absolutely love it! Took my boyfriend a little time and some frustration to put together, but it was WORTH it! Holds up to 250lbs, and it's heavy metal, and thick so it holds up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: So I received this today. Was very easy to assemble. It uses plastic clips for the selves to slip over and rest on. This rack is just to to flimsy. Could be a good product it's just not stable or solid. I also have a twenty inch microwave. Product states it is twenty one inches. Only the top board is Twenty one inches. The shelves are seventeen and a half. Not a good product. Do not expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: plastic sleeves do not hold shelves up during assembly ! It is back under my bed in it's box.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy shelves, good material . The locking clips do not hold the shelves in place . shelf posts slid down on top and over the clips. going to the floor. dis-assembly was not as easy as the assembly. The plastic clips were half in and out of corners of shelves, I can not ship back so I got 1 inch hose clamps & am going to use them , and JB weld to make shelf supports. Totally disappointed in this product . I do not recommend, in fact I warn others not to buy unless the make the clips like the shelf ones . interlocking 2 piece clips. .
customer_reviews.author: Iggy scratching

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: I have had this baker's rack for 2 years, and have been most happy with it. I use it to display items. The wood for the shelf is really pretty, and the grooves allow plates to be stood up for display. Recently, I moved twice. In the course of the moves, 3 of the feet fell off. I looked through the Amazon site for the feet alone, and did not find them. However, I called Whitmor to ask to buy some feet. They explained that they did not sell them, but would send me 3 feet. I was thrilled. Because of this kindness, I will be forever a Whitmor fan, and will recommend them to anyone with organizational needs.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne T

customer_reviews.title: h
customer_reviews.text: Should be a very nice microwave stand. Assembly is easy and the finish is great. The shelves are fully adjustable. HOWEVER, with a heavy microwave in place, the cart is extremely wobbly. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Mikkelsen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: My mother needed a little cart to hold some of her small to medium sized appliances and this one was easy to assemble and does the job just fine! The locking mechanism on the wheels could be improved. Otherwise she is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rome_411

customer_reviews.title: Second time was a charm
customer_reviews.text: My original order arrived broken.. The wood was split into 3 pieces. I was refunded 100%, took the chance & ordered another. The next one arrived intact & this unit is exactly what I needed, because my new kitchen is very small. This has a wood top for food preparation, a space with pull-out drawer for my microwave, and a space for my toaster oven. It's on Wheels so I can move out of the way when I'm not using it. It also has some hooks on the side, which I used to hang pots and pans and a towel. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Was running out of cupboard space for all of our pots and pans, and needed a nice easy way consolidate space. This worked perfectly for that. Four pans, a food processor, insta pot, two hand mixers, a kitchenaid, and a massive pot all fit on this beauty and I still have room for more, and did not set anything on the cutting board. By the way, the cutting board is a perfect cheese/appetizer board, and great for food prep. If you need more cupboard space, or just want a decent rack, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cox

customer_reviews.title: Fits tightly in a 36" wide tall locker.
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this to have a tier on my workbench. Instead I was able to squeeze it in, side to side between shelves in a 36" wide, tall garage locker. I now can store my cordless 18v batteries and chargers under the shelf and the 18v tools that stand on this new shelf. It assembled in minutes out of the box. The reason why it was a tight fit is due to the locker having rows of inward indented rows of "fingers" on each side that allow the cabinet shelves to fit over to be very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: rds

customer_reviews.title: More space from your space "GET ORGANIZED" They have it!
customer_reviews.text: From their stacking shoe racks to closet organizers, Whitmor has some of the most useful, space creating ideas I have ever seen. This was a microwave cart to store 3 sewing machines in a mobile manor. Well made, reasonably priced, and backed by a tremendous customer service department if it fails to survive shipping or whatever! Outstanding people to do business with. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Barry H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, wanted it to be better
customer_reviews.text: It’s ... okay. It’s not as durable or as sturdy as I had hoped, nor is it as substantial as a prep area, especially with pans or pots hanging. I’m only 5’5” and I feel too big for this product. It’s a shame. I ended up going with a stainless steel kitchen prep table which is MUCH better. I’m stuck with this damn baker’s rack, so I keep my water filter and water kettle on it, with the pots and pans and other kitchen crap.
customer_reviews.author: C. Be

customer_reviews.title: heavy, sturdy, pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product for the price. Carefully measure to be sure it will fit. Length and width are perfect for me, but who knew I had to measure the height? My faucet is very low profile and I never thought it would be a problem, but it won't clear by just a very tiny fraction of an inch. Sigh. There's room for a little adjustment in the height depending on how far you screw in the leg caps on the bottom, but the higher you make it, it loses stability. Definitely a great product if it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: it still looks like it did out of the package with no mold ...
customer_reviews.text: This might be the most used thing in my bathroom. It was larger than expected and holds a lot of items. After 2 years, it still looks like it did out of the package with no mold on the wood or rust on the metal parts. I keep or over the sink so it gets a lot of water on it.
customer_reviews.author: c wil

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, would be perfect if it had longer legs.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble and it fit over my kitchen sink but was a pretty close fit. I could still use my faucet but wanted the shelf to be a bit higher so it would be even with the bottom of the window so it would look a bit nicer. I managed to find something at a local hardware store that works to elevate the legs. It's just long screws with large, flat bottoms. It elevated this just enough. It would be perfect if the company had legs that could be unscrewed to make this higher.
customer_reviews.author: Sewcrafty

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: We have all our essential oils (in clear acrylic nail polish organizers) resting behind our kitchen sink on this! The wood came scraped up in one spot from the metal frame getting bent against it. They sent out a new board and was able to straighten out the metal without incident, it looks good as new. Good customer service, so would not hesitate to order another one if needed. It seems sturdy, like it will last a long time. It is a great way to organize, while using an underutilized area to maximize space! Love how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Special Apps, Special Kids

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Bent, But Otherwise Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The reason that I am giving this 3 stars is that the rack and top shelf were bent. Other than that, this looks like it will be an excellent space saver that will be sturdy and easy to clean and will allow me to clear off my butcher block so that I can use that more appropriately. Great for apartment living. I received it today. I hope that it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Borden

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a full size baker's rack, but it is barely 5 ft tall. Much too short to hold pots or pan and still be able to use top shelf board. The shelves are also quite small, won't fit any of my larger kitchen appliances (microwave, stand mixer, etc) which was the point of having it. Returned immediately after assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Araminta David

customer_reviews.title: very well-made card
customer_reviews.text: I love the cart! I bought this card to free up some counter space and it turned out to be much better than I thought it would be. it is very sturdy, it is somewhat heavy, and the wheels lock I like all of these features. The shelves are adjustable and one pulls out. If they had a bigger version of this card I would buy it. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KarenB_AZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! This little shelf is the perfect width and height for my sink, doesn't get in the way of washing dishes and holds all my stuff up and out of my way. Unlike my previous sink shelf, it doesn't leave a dark cave over my faucet handles. Seems sturdy and with adjustable feet on the legs, even if it was a little wobbly, the fix is fast! Love it! -UPDATE- Two years later and this thing is STILL as great as it was on day one! Superior quality! No rust, no wear, the wood is a tad stained because my plant saucers have overflowed a few times. All my fault!
customer_reviews.author: evilratgoddess

customer_reviews.title: does what I want
customer_reviews.text: I need a small cart to carry 5 gal water bottle. It is sturdy enough, just don't push it over uneven surfaces. I got 5, 3 and 6 one gallon water bottles on the cart. Off the floor and easy to move around the kitchen. It could hold more. It was easy to assemble with some patience. You need a hammer and scissors. I am happy with it and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Silloway

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted by the quality and price of this Kitchen Cart. Easy to put together and it STURDY and easy to move with the casters. Highly Recommend this product. I will be buying more now.
customer_reviews.author: S. Plapp

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE IT! I desperately needed it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE IT! I desperately needed it! I have a small studio and just a hotplate to cook with. I hated cooking because I had no place to put anything. This rack is now literally my kitchen and storage. Set up was incredibly easy. I put all my spices, oils, jams, and small bags of onions on top. My heavy appliances like toaster oven and rice cooker are at the bottom. Still filling the middle shelf with my big pots and some food like bread and cereal. I'm really happy with this purchase and glad to have space to actually cook now, or even just cut vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: Titaina Willis

customer_reviews.title: Also A Perfectly Portable Sewing Cart!
customer_reviews.text: it was pretty easy to assemble and I actually used it as a sewing cart since my apartment is too small for a proper table. I looked for a wheely cart that could fit my sewing machine and serger but all of the ones I found were either too small or couldn't hold the weight of them! I thought outside the box and went for a microwave cart I fit my sewing machine on the top with my serger on the pull out shelf and my bin of projects on the bottom shelf! it worked perfectly for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyCoCa

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than other shelves
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our kitchen. I use it as a coffee station. I wish I could buy extra s hooks in the same style though. Just a heads up, this rack is smaller than the regular shelving unit of the same brand--it's thinner (the actuall bars) and shorter. I bought this and a regular one to go next to it but they look goofy side by side. I'm sure it wouldn't be noticeable if they weren't next to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for, and after a few weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a very strong box. Well packed, and safe. Was very easy and fast to assemble. Holds more weight then I thought it would. Only thing I would have liked it to be is about 6 inches taller. The plastic shelf linings were not made for the these shelves. One needs to trim the liners to fit the shelves. Other then that it is strong and easy to clean. Would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: PC  Webster

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself in less than thirty minutes, as it says on the box. It's attractive and most of all it's sturdy. I have a small kitchen and needed something that would "extend" one counter that had a small amount of extra space next to it. This is perfect for my blender. I put a few things that I need quickly on the shelves below. The wooden cutting board is elegant. It's a perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing rack!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rack. It's perfect for all my big appliances that I dont want to stuff in a cabinet. Kitchen aid mixer, food processor, coffee maker, etc. I get so many compliments on the look of it too. It's definetely one prerry rack. The first day I put it together, I spent so much time in the kitchen because I just love the way it looks. Assembly was SO easy, too. I was able to do this by myself as a female. Bought in April and it's still in amazing shape as of June! If you are on the fence, just buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, sturdy and good look
customer_reviews.text: Well made and large enough for a double bowl sink too I needed to free up space around my sink to stay dry, safe from water Be aware, if you have a tall faucet, this would not be the right item for you! When I will have a new up to date, taller faucet this will have to be placed somewhere else, that’s fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: WearePals

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this cart. It LOOKS great, but it's wobbly and the top does not fit squarely into the four upright poles. Also, threads on one of the two-piece legs aren't machines properly - probably the cause of the problems described above. Also, the slide-out shelf does not move freely. An identical looking cart purchased at Target about 5 years ago is far far superior in every way. Decided to take a chance on this one because of Prime membership and fast delivery. Wish I hadn't.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Will Do
customer_reviews.text: This is okay space wise and you definitely have to anchor it on the wall. What was frustrating were the connectors: some of them did not hold tightly, making them slip down the pole thus making the shelves uneven; took many tries to get them to stick. The wooden top is nice. It will help me with kitchen storage space in the 400 sq foot space I'm trying to make work.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and quick to assemble. Very sturdy - my husband wanted something to store all his cast iron cookware and this holds quite a lot. Bought more S hooks and he has pans hanging from the top shelf and flat pieces hanging on the sides. Description rates the top shelf at 25lbs but I can tell you it will hold a lot more than that, he has 8 or 10 heavy pans hanging from it and no sign of distress.
customer_reviews.author: mam

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's a little small, like it's meant for the kitchen in a tiny house, but it has added much needed storage and "counter" space. It could be more sturdy, it shakes a good amount when using a stand mixer and the cutting board top does not get secured to the metal frame. But all in all its a good purchase, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product very strong solid steel
customer_reviews.text: Great product very strong solid steel , great butcher block top However the slide out shelf is smaller than the top and bottom shelf. My plan was to place my coffer maker and toaster side by side on it and the microwave on the top but the shelf was not wide enough It would have worked if the pull out shelf had been the same size as the top and bottom shelf The advertising should state that fact. However we thought the product was so good we decided to keep it and just position the toaster on top of the microwave ! ( Where there's a will there's a way !!) LOL !
customer_reviews.author: carl hankerson

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice to have 2 shelves instead of just 1 - DEFECTIVE -  it will not fit!
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if I had two shelves instead of one to use below the cutting board area. One of the shelving units is extremely bent and therefore the pole that will attach everything isn't able to go through due to the large dent. I can still use it but I really needed the 2 shelves and not just 1. Will keep anyway but really disappointed - it's a great product - just wish mine worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: jc in atlanta

customer_reviews.title: I like a nice RACK!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of counter space in my kitchen, needed a nice rack to place a few kitchen items on. This rack is durable and very, very easy to install. And I love the fact it has adjustable screw feet to make sure the rack is adjustable to uneven floors. I don't have to worry that my appliances will fall off the rack. Very happy with my purchase, makes my kitchen look like a chefs kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: BookGroupie

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a bakers rack for a while now and knew my husband would argue that we didn't need one so, I decided not to tell him and get one anyways. Lol He ended up loving it as much as I do! Perfect little coffee area with added storage for my baking supplies. I'm 5ft and my husband is 5ft10 and we don't mind the height. I definitely see it being bothersome to chop with if you're taller than us. I'm 8.5 months pregnant and was able to assemble this on my own so safe to say it was very easy. Took about 10 minutes from when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Studio Apartments with no Counter Space
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect, OK? I've got a studio apartment and don't really have a lot of room to work with. I had absolutely NO counter space so this baking rack saved my life. I've got more room for groceries and plenty of prep space for getting food ready. You can fit a coffee pot, some containers of spices, and still have the vast majority of the space left over for prep space. The storage underneath is adjustable, so you can make the space between the lower and highest level larger or smaller. You easily could put a microwave on the bottom shelves and store other larger kitchen appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Homeboy Gotcha

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I love this, we are renting and have a very small kitchen. This looks great, can double as a cutting board, holds a lot of our kitchen stuff, and we can even have plants on top! Great deal for the price. Easy to put together too
customer_reviews.author: Troy egri

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! The shelves are adjustable depending on how much space you want. The wooden shelf doubles as a cutting board or just a nice shelf piece. We chose not to use the hooks but it does come with them! It’s exactly what we wanted for an affordable price. Updated review: still love it, still amazing. However not good for a spice rack! Lol the bars on the top shelf are too big to fit my spices. Still a great buy and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: So far good, but need to raise more
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, in that quality is sturdy and it is in perfect shape - although I bought opened. I am still in need to “raise” the legs two inches or so, because the shelf rests on the closed faucet. In other words, it cannot be over my sink as is. Yet, I like it enough to try to solve. SUGGESTIONS ARE WELCOMED. I might update.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Cuervo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and the perfect length for my double sink. Unfortunately my faucet didn't have enough room to push upward to turn the water on - so check that before purchasing - so I moved it to the radiator cover at the window and it's very sturdy... was going to put plants on it but the cats prefer sitting on and under it instead. So it's definitely sturdy and doesn't move. Glad I got it :) Great shelf.
customer_reviews.author: MGTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a small apartment with a very small kitchen and even less cabinet space. i needed something to store my large collection of cookware. not only was this reasonably priced, it was exactly what I was looking for. My husband put it together very quickly and I have had no complaints since I bought it. It looks very nice in my small kitchen and holds everything I had no where to put. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone who needs more storage in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Leathern

customer_reviews.title: Best Adult Purchase I’ve Made In A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: I love this bakers rack. It was easy to assemble. I did it in about 15 mins by myself and that includes the unboxing time. It’s very sturdy and I love the wood topper. I bought more S hooks so I was able to hang coffee cups, cooking utensils, and the lids to my pots. I highly recommend this bakers rack.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. I put it together myself in about 10-15 minutes. It feels a tiny bit wobbly, I also didn’t put the straps on and secure it to the wall. I needed it for storage but mostly for my plants. The top would be great to store spices or cook boos or whatever you want but I like my plants. The storage on the bottom is great and I LOVE the cutting board. Very durable and heavy duty, and I really like when the cutting board has grooves around the edges so nothing will fall off the side when your prepping. It’s perfect for what I needed and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Moro

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bakers rack at a decent price. Easy to assemble came with all the parts and extras. Very sturdy and very well made. The cutting board is great. Easy to take off and clean and put back. Hooks help for storage and easy access and plenty of room in the shelves for storage. Overall in very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx Avanzar

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra storage!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitchen is too small for all the things and this baker's rack has been a life saver! The one problem is the hooks are a bit low so any pan that you want to hang with a longer handle will not hang. We had to move the hook to the top of the rack so one of our pans would fit. The rack was easy to set up and is durable and great if you're short on space.
customer_reviews.author: sfry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit over my faucet  but worked for a counter shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that it would fit over my faucet but it was just a little to short. But it did work for a shelf beside my sink! it freed up space when I make sandwiches or prep for dinner. The shelf is wide enough so that I can place my breads, fruits, etc. while I fix the dish I'm going to serve. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: force

customer_reviews.title: Supportive & great customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, holds quite a bit, & looks good. Mine came with a damaged shelf (box was probably dropped in shipping), so one support pole couldn't go through it. I emailed them, as instructed in the package, and they immediately sent me a perfect conditioned replacement.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This product is not to scale
customer_reviews.text: Despite the photography, this is a miniature baker’s rack. The columns are 1/2” in diameter, the wire shelving is a narrow guage and the shelves — at 18” wide — are too shallow to hold a compact microwave. From the photos, I expected a full-sized baker’s rack. To be be fair, the copy (waaaaaay down the page) does provide accurate dimensions if you read that far. It seems well built, but it looks like a toy for play kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The parts don't work and the customer service number is nonexistent!
customer_reviews.text: Similar issues were brought up in other reviews but I just never saw that it'd happen to mine as well during assembly. The rack is on backwards unless you want it on in an awkward position. They ask to call before returning, so I'm trying to do what they said. But I have called on several days during their service hours, and their customer service number always said they were closed for the remainder of the business day. I just emailed them and hopefully will get a response, finally. I'm replacing the parts. If it doesn't work, hopefully I will get a full refund through customer service that may or may not exist.
customer_reviews.author: Xinyu Zong

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I now have stored my Instant Pot and my heavy Kitchen Aid mixer on this stand. I bought S-hooks and hung pots and pans around the top sides and back. Because the butcher block is a good fit, I just lifted it up to put in the s-hooks. They’re not going anywhere LOL. I took 2 more S-hooks and put my hand made rolling pin in the front. I got a LOT on that cart. It’s handling it beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Bengalmama

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I have a smaller sized kitchen in our apartment and honestly, we ran out of cabinet space. I was looking for something easy on the eyes that I could store all our appliances and such on. It’s a really good size and so sturdy! I was surprised with how much I could fit on it. They shelves are adjustable as well. It did take a while to assemble because of the poles that hold each shelf, but I think that should be assumed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, buy this now!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING!!! It's everything I needed it to be and more. We have a very small apartment and all of my counter space was taken up with kitchen tools, machines, etc.. this is absolutely perfect. SO sturdy, very easy to assemble (took husband 10 min.) And holds every single thing with ease! You won't regret this one, buy it for sure! I bought some extra S hooks on here, and they hold my cutting boards perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JenG

customer_reviews.title: For real
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased and pleasantly surprised. Straight-forward installation. (Do yourself a favor, follow the instructions.) The cutting board is wood not particle board. It's an attractive, inexpensive and sturdy baker's rack. I placed all the kitchen gadgets on the shelves underneath, thus maximizing kitchen counter space. I despise clutter. Having more room to prep food is great!
customer_reviews.author: Moxie

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but the cutting board isn't really usable as a cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I love this baker's rack. It has been a part of my kitchen for four years now. I keep my 90lb dog's food and water bowls on the bottom shelf, and he has plenty of room to stick his head under to eat and drink. It is great storage and holds a ton of stuff! The top is great to store pot lids vertically between the slats. I've taken off two stars because the wooden "cutting board" isn't very good quality and doesn't fit snugly. It isn't very good for use as a cutting board at all, if that is important to you. For my non-cutting board required needs, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Defective metal
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this rack and at first i was really excited with how supposedly easy it was to assemble, needing no tools at all. The clasps that you attach as stoppers slid easily. Most importantly, one of the holes in a rack was crooked so it was hard to insert to the pole. Luckily, there are 3 racks and i put the defective one in the bottom and won't be putting anything heavy on top of it. I would totally return it if it weren't super heavy and I didn't live overseas which makes Amazon returns complicated and tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Ceziepie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shelves, nice design, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This bakers rack is wonderful! Its perfect to store kitchen items often in use. The height is good for someone under 5'5 if you actually use it for preparing food. It's sturdy if assembled properly. I don't know what sharp edges some people are complaining about because there aren't any. The shelves are adjustable and the wood board is removable. I honestly love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

product_meta.title: Whitmor Supreme Baker’s Rack with Food Safe Removable Wood Cutting Board - Chrome
product_meta.description:
Style Name:BAKER'S RACKGive yourself a little extra space in the kitchen, garage, or even the office with this sturdy Whitmor 6054 268, Supreme Chrome Baker's Rack. This rack comes with a removable cutting board that provides ample space for preparation. It is made from chrome-plated steel to provide a durable performance. You can also hang your pots and pans on the 4 accessory hooks that come with this rack. Assembly is very easy and can be done without tools. Easy to clean, just wipe with a damp cloth and towel dry. This item comes with a 10 year limited warranty. Assembled measurements are 36.25”x 14”x 55.14”. Whitmor is a 4th generation family-owned and operated business. Since 1946, Whitmor has been dedicated to bringing organization home by creating products that simplify everyday life. Ensuring that those products are built with integrity, value, and innovation is our commitment to you. And our promise is that we will always be here for you should you ever need us as we stand behind our product 100%. Whitmor customer service is available in English and Spanish Monday through Friday from 8am - 4: 30pm cst. Call us and we will gladly assist you in your language. You may contact Whitmor toll-free at 1-888-944-8667 or via email at help@whitmor.com.

BRAND STORY
By Whitmor

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Kitchen wire baker's rack with cutting board top. There are two shelves below cutting surface and one shelf above. Baker's rack comes with hooks for hanging utensils. Unit measures 14-Inch by 36.25-Inch by 55.25-Inch.

See more
feature_bullets: Provides additional kitchen workspace and heavy duty storage
Removable wood shelf can be used like a butcher's block or for appliances and cookware
Adjustable hanging bar for extra storage includes 4 chromed hooks for dish towels, pots, pans and more
Lower shelf has a 250 pound capacity, Shelves on rack adjust in 1 inch increments to accommodate various sized cookware

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars6,599 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
